SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ChatMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ChatMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ChatMessage extends Object implements Serializable
ChatMessage is a class that represents a message sent from a player to another or to all players in the game.
Since:
08/04/2023
Version:
3.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
